result.html: D'ól mé dhá phiontaI drank two pints.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé ḋá ṗiontaI drank two pints.

result.html: D'ól sí as gloineShe drank from a glass.
result.ponchtml: D'ól sí as gloineShe drank from a glass.

result.eng: They drank some of the whiskey.
result.ga: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.orig: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.html: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beathaThey drank some of the whiskey.
result.ponchtml: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beaṫaThey drank some of the whiskey.

result.eng: I drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ga: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.orig: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisce
result.html: D'ól mé a bhféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé a ḃféadfainn den uisceI drank as much of the water as I could.

result.eng: I drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ga: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.orig: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.html: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur ċaill mé mo ṁeaḃair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.

result.eng: He drank another gulp from it.
result.html: Bhain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
